name: Selected Colorbox Image
author: Vipul Hadiya

sections.description: Selected Colorbox Image plugin allow you to select one or more or all images to show it/theme in Colorbox popup. Selected Colorbox Image provide you datatable based image list with title, image and ID list, just select images you want to display in Colorbox popup and that\’s all.
sections.installation: Follow these steps to install Selected Colorbox Image plugins to your wordpress site: 1. Upload allimg.zip to your site/wp-content/plugins/ directory 2. Activate Selected Colorbox Image plugins from your admin dashboard 3. Once you activate the plugin, you will find \’Colorbox\’ menu in your left menu panel 4. Go there and select whatever images you want to show in colorbox popup
sections.changelog: This is the first ever release of Selected Colorbox Image () v1.0.0.

short_description: Select images just with a single click to show them in colorbox popup from admin ajax grid.
